channel.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
channel.description:
Does anyone have an account that has not done tutorial island?
Thanks

item.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @ComputerLove ComputerLove
item.description:
@ComputerLove wrote:

I have 3 RuneClassic accounts. 1 From 2002, 1 from I signed up last year I think, and one from my friend (if he didn’t change the password). 2 of them haven’t done the tutorial island yet. I will sell them

Read full topic
item.source: RSC account that has not done tutorial island

item.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @malikz malikz
item.description:
@malikz wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:13, topic:449110”]If I recall, you can get as many items as you want, but when you leave the island, you lose them and your back to the starting items… I would try to leave with 1k air runes :)[/quote]I remember that lol…farmed like 10k arrows I believe and got screwed over.

Read full topic
item.source: RSC account that has not done tutorial island

item.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:14, topic:449110"][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=552006.msg4044574#msg4044574 date=1341974047]
If I recall, you can get as many items as you want, but when you leave the island, you lose them and your back to the starting items… I would try to leave with 1k air runes
[/quote]
Yeah. Your inventory was completely wiped and new items were added to prevent that. I remember a bug where you could get out with them, buying a membership and waiting till it runs out will teleport you to lumbridge so you keep all the items in your inventory.[/quote]

100k air runes would be nice

Read full topic
item.source: RSC account that has not done tutorial island

item.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

If I recall, you can get as many items as you want, but when you leave the island, you lose them and your back to the starting items… I would try to leave with 1k air runes

Yeah. Your inventory was completely wiped and new items were added to prevent that. I remember a bug where you could get out with them, buying a membership and waiting till it runs out will teleport you to lumbridge so you keep all the items in your inventory.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Really the only things we don’t have is when you try to enter the door before speaking to the guide. I also don’t know hwat happens if you speak to the combat instructor after you lost just one of the items he gives you (he gives you two). There might be more but I’m not sure.

Read full topic

item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

Skipping it is just retarded. You either have them do the tutorial or don’t release it imo. And I’m pretty sure the tutorial island nerdy ass yong min was 100% correct. Can use that as a reference.

item.title: RSC account that has not done tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:2, topic:449110”]I highly doubt it seeing as only accounts that logged into RSC in the ?3 weeks? after RS2 launched were left active. Very unlikely that someone would login to RSC, not do anything on the account and still remember the details.

Maybe this will help though http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gwq_vckEF_8[/quote]When it was re-opened you were sent to tutorial island, but most people just skipped it.

Read full topic
